qas.question: What year was the Spanish governor expelled?
What year did Portugal invade the recently liberated territory?
What was Juan Antonio Lavalleja's band caled?
What year was Uruguay consolidated as an independent state?

context: The Spanish governor was expelled in <a0_0>1814<a0_0/>. In <a1_0>1816<a1_0/>, Portugal invaded the recently liberated territory and in 1821, it was annexed to the Banda Oriental of Brazil. Juan Antonio Lavalleja and his band called the <a2_0>Treinta y Tres Orientales<a2_0/> ("Thirty-Three Orientals") re-established the independence of the region in 1825. Uruguay was consolidated as an independent state in <a3_0>1828<a3_0/>, with Montevideo as the nation's capital. In 1829, the demolition of the city's fortifications began and plans were made for an extension beyond the Ciudad Vieja, referred to as the "Ciudad Nueva" ("new city"). Urban expansion, however, moved very slowly because of the events that followed.
